See the License for the specific language governing rights * and limitations under the License. * The Original Code is Compiere ERP & Business Solution * The Initial Developer of the Original Code is Jorg Janke and ComPiere, Inc. * Portions created by Jorg Janke are Copyright (C) 1999-2001 Jorg Janke, * parts created by ComPiere are Copyright (C) ComPiere, Inc.; * All Rights Reserved. * Contributor(s): Openbravo SLU * Contributions are Copyright (C) 2001-2008 Openbravo, S.L.U. * * Specifically, this derivative work is based upon the following Compiere * file and version. ************************************************************************* * $Id: C_Invoice_Create0.sql,v 1.2 2002/06/08 03:25:03 jjanke Exp $ *** * Title: Create Invoice * Description: ************************************************************************/ v_Dummy varchar2(32); BEGIN C_Invoice_Create(p_PInstance_ID, v_Dummy, NULL) ; END C_INVOICE_CREATE0
